entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Oxford House
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
